FuncDef: The display mpls convergence mode command displays whether the service next hops are decoupled from LDP and SR-MPLS BE.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After the mpls ldp-srbe convergence enhance command is run and a device is restarted, to check whether the service next hops are decoupled from LDP and SR-MPLS BE, run the display mpls convergence mode command.
